languages.text: Whenever an enemy suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from a damage-over-time effect inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} for the first time in combat, this damage is increased by +100%.

traits.locale_text: First time each enemy is damaged by a DoT applied by Executioner, that damage is increased by 100%.
Whenever an enemy suffers damage inflicted by a damage-over-time effect applied by the Executioner for the first time in combat, this damage is increased by +100%.
Whenever an enemy suffers damage inflicted by a damage-over-time effect applied by the Executioner for the first time in combat, this damage is increased by +100%.
Whenever an enemy suffers damage from a damage-over-time effect inflicted by the Executioner for the first time in combat, this damage is increased by +100%.

Whenever an enemy suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from a damage-over-time effect inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} for the first time in combat, this damage is increased by +100%.

languages.text: Cuando un enemigo sufre {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de un efecto de daño continuado infligido por el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} por primera vez en el combate, el daño aumenta un +100 %.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from a damage-over-time effect inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} for the first time in combat, this damage is increased by +100%.

traits.locale_text: Cuando un enemigo sufre {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de un efecto de daño continuado infligido por el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} por primera vez en el combate, el daño aumenta un +100 %.

languages.text: 戦闘中に、敵が{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}に与えられた継続ダメージから初めて{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けるたび、このダメージは+100%増加する。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from a damage-over-time effect inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} for the first time in combat, this damage is increased by +100%.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘中に、敵が{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}に与えられた継続ダメージから初めて{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けるたび、このダメージは+100%増加する。

languages.text: 当敌人在战斗中首次受到{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}的持续伤害效果造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，该效果造成的伤害提高100%。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from a damage-over-time effect inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} for the first time in combat, this damage is increased by +100%.

traits.locale_text: 当敌人在战斗中首次受到{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}的持续伤害效果造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，该效果造成的伤害提高100%。

languages.text: Erleidet ein Gegner im Kampf erstmals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch einen Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekt des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g}s, erhöht sich dieser Schaden um +100 %.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from a damage-over-time effect inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} for the first time in combat, this damage is increased by +100%.

traits.locale_text: Erleidet ein Gegner im Kampf erstmals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch einen Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekt des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g}s, erhöht sich dieser Schaden um +100 %.

languages.text: Lorsqu'au cours d'un combat, un ennemi subit pour la première fois des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} d'un effet de dégâts progressifs infligé par l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g}, ces dégâts sont augmentés de 100 %.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from a damage-over-time effect inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} for the first time in combat, this damage is increased by +100%.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'au cours d'un combat, un ennemi subit pour la première fois des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} d'un effet de dégâts progressifs infligé par l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g}, ces dégâts sont augmentés de 100 %.

languages.text: При первом за бой получении периодического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от эффекта, наложенного {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палачом{/g}, противник получает удвоенный урон.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from a damage-over-time effect inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} for the first time in combat, this damage is increased by +100%.

traits.locale_text: При первом за бой получении периодического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от эффекта, наложенного {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палачом{/g}, противник получает удвоенный урон.
